column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Teresa - Thank you very much for the great review. I'm glad we were worth your trip. In the future
column2: if there's ever any issue with your bowl of ramen
column3: just let your server know and he or she will make things right. We take pride in our customers walking away from our establishment satisfied
column4: which is why we take the time to review every review that comes through. Thank you again
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
